page.title: 15RELIGION IN THE VALLEY
page.content: A wide variety of religious beliefs can be found throughout the Tame valley.The three strongest groups are the{Church of England,Roman {Catholics}and{Methodists.}Other religions to be found include { {Unitarians,Congregationalist}and{ {Jehovah's Witness}all of which have places of worship in the area. Asian immigrants are now having an impact on the form of places of worship. Plans have been made to open a Mosque for those of the{Islamic}faith. The fact that there are three parish churches for C. of E. arises because of Mossley once being within the boundaries of three counties. These churches are St.Georges (Lancashire), St.Johns (Yorkshire) and All Saints (Cheshire) . The R.C.Church is St.Joseph's situated in Top Mossley.
